name: The Devil's Spawn
description:
Spawn an army of minions to defeat the forces of good

Instructions

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Gather skulls to level up
  • Only your minions can fight

Created during the Mini Jam 120: Hell

Credits

Art: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii,  https://0x72.itch.io/dungeonui & https://opengameart.org/content/halloween-characters

Sounds: https://benjaminno.itch.io/sweet-sounds-sfx-pack

Music: https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack

Font: https://vrtxrry.itch.io/dungeonfont
